edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.ciphertext

Class ElGamalOnByteArrayCiphertext

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.ciphertext.ElGamalOnByteArrayCiphertext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsymmetricCiphertext

    public class ElGamalOnByteArrayCiphertext
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsymmetricCiphertext
    This class is a container that encapsulates the cipher data resulting from applying the ElGamalOnByteArray encryption.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

        public ElGamalOnByteArrayCiphertext(GroupElement c1,

        Create an instance of this container class. This constructor is used by the Encryption Scheme as a result of a call to function encrypt.
        Parameters:
        c1 - the first part of the cihertext
        c2 - the second part of the ciphertext

      • generateSendableData

        public AsymmetricCiphertextSendableData generateSendableData()
        Description copied from interface: AsymmetricCiphertext
        This function is used when an asymmetric ciphertext needs to be sent via a Channel or any other means of sending data (including serialization). It retrieves all the data needed to reconstruct this ciphertext at a later time and/or in a different VM. It puts all the data in an instance of the relevant class that implements the AsymmetricCiphertextSendableData interface.
        Specified by:
        generateSendableData in interface AsymmetricCiphertext
        Returns:
        the AsymmetricCiphertextSendableData object
        See Also:
        AsymmetricCiphertext.generateSendableData()
